messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] Unschooling conferences
messages.messageBody:
<<<<I would like to get recommendations for unschooling conferences that
are fun for the whole family (ds 11, dd 7) to go to.>>>>

Live and Learn!!!! Life changing, joyful, many of your favorite "posters" in
person, funshops of immense diversity, free children showing it working, the
Secret Society of Unschooling Dads meeting. Many of us simply call it "the"
conference.

www.LiveandLearnConference.org

And a list discussing same:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/LiveandLearnConference/

Robyn L. Coburn

---

messages.subject: Unschooling conferences
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I haven t posted in a very long time. I m more of a lurker, I guess. I would like to get recommendations for unschooling conferences that are fun for
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
I haven't posted in a very long time. I'm more of a lurker, I guess.
I would like to get recommendations for unschooling conferences that
are fun for the whole family (ds 11, dd 7) to go to.
Warnings about where not to go are appreciated too!
We have been to Rethinking Education several times and may want to
go there again (although it is now in Sep.), but we'd like to see
what else is available.
Thanks,
Sybelle
